tit.cmt: (京都府) を追加しました。

sen.j: 東雲駅（しののめえき）は、京都府舞鶴市水間にある、北近畿タンゴ鉄道(KTR)北近畿タンゴ鉄道宮津線の鉄道駅。
sen.e: Located in Mizuma, Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture, Shinonome Station is a stop on the Miyazu Line, which is operated by Kitakinki Tango Railway (KTR).
Shinonome Station, located in Mizuma, Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture, is a stop on the Miyazu Line, which is operated by Kitakinki Tango Railway (KTR).
Shinonome Station, located in Mizuma, Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture, is a stop on the Miyazu Line, which is operated by Kitakinki Tango Railway (KTR).

tit.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: 2面2線（プラットホーム）で無人駅。
sen.e: It is an unmanned station provided with two platforms with two tracks served between them.
It is an unmanned station provided with two platforms serving two tracks between them.
It is an unmanned station provided with two platforms serving two tracks between them.

sen.j: 交換設備は一時期撤去されていたが、KTR転換時に復活している。
sen.e: The facilities for enabling up-trains and down-trains to meet here to swich use of the tracks were removed once, but were restored when the ownership of the station was transferred to KTR.

The facilities that allow up trains and down trains to meet here in order to switch use of the tracks were removed once, but they were restored when the ownership of the station was transferred to KTR.

The facilities that allow inbound trains and outbound trains to meet here in order to switch use of the tracks were removed once, but they were restored when the ownership of the station was transferred to KTR.
sen.cmt: 上り、下り→inbound, outbound としました。

sen.j: 便所は、汲み取り式便所。
sen.e: The lavatory is a human waste-collecting type one.
The lavatory is of the type that collects the human waste.
The lavatory is of the type that collects the human waste.

tit.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.e: Anju-hime-zuka (Tumulus of Princess Anju)
Anju-hime-zuka (Tumulus of Princess Anju)
Anju-hime-zuka (Tumulus of Princess Anju)

sen.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: 2006年度の1日あたりの乗車人員は約52人である。
sen.e: The number of persons getting on board at this station is approx. 52 a day in the fiscal 2006.
In fiscal 2006, the average daily number of persons getting on board at this station was 52.
In fiscal year 2006, the average daily number of persons getting on board at this station was 52.
(From statistics of Kyoto Prefecture)
(From statistics of Kyoto Prefecture)
(According to the Kyoto Prefecture Statistics Report)
sen.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.e: April 12, 1924 - Its operation started.
April 12, 1924: The station became operational.
April 12, 1924: The station became operational.

sen.j: 1987年（昭和62年）4月1日 - 日本国有鉄道分割民営化により、西日本旅客鉄道の駅となる。
sen.e: April 1, 1987 - Due to the division and privitization of Japan National Railways, it became a station of West Japan Railway Company (JR West).
April 1, 1987: Due to the division and privatization of Japan National Railways, it became a station of West Japan Railway Company (JR West).
April 1, 1987: Due to the division and privatization of Japan National Railways, it became a station of West Japan Railway Company (JR West).

sen.j: 1990年（平成2年）4月1日 - 宮津線が北近畿タンゴ鉄道に移管され、同鉄道の駅となる。
sen.e: April 1, 1990 - The Miyazu Line was transferred to Kitakinki Tango Railway, and it became a station of the railway company.
April 1, 1990: The Miyazu Line was transferred to Kitakinki Tango Railway, and it became a station of that railway company.
April 1, 1990: The Miyazu Line was transferred to Kitakinki Tango Railway, and it became a station of that railway company.

sen.j: 1994年（平成6年）3月28日 - 現在の駅舎が竣工になる。
sen.e: March 28, 1994 - The construction of the present station house was completed.
March 28, 1994: The construction of the present station house was completed.
March 28, 1994: The construction of the present station house was completed.

tit.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。
